task_description: Facing the building to your East (approx. 107°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I’m no longer aimed at the target building (should be ~107°E), so I need to rotate right to bring the building back into view while staying pitched up to see its top.
To estimate height I need the roofline and base in view, so I should look up to capture the top of the main building.
The heading reset again away from the target (~107°), so I should rotate right to re-acquire the building while keeping the upward pitch.
I should stop rotating and instead give the best height estimate from this viewpoint, using typical storey heights and the visible number of floors/roofline.
